participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Emily enjoys deep conversations about literature and has a passion for athletics.
participant_1.background: My brother and I have been close since childhood, and we bond over our shared love of music. I love all of my beautiful children. I always put my left sock on first. I have none to share my thoughts about the books I read. I run track.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and curious, Jake is determined to achieve his dreams and enjoys stargazing and exploring new genres in reading.
participant_2.background: I am excited to study hard and reach my dream of becoming an astronaut. I used to work a 9 5 job as a telemarketer. I spent my summer nights at the coffee shop, watching the stars. I'm not sure how my parents died, but I'm sure they loved me very much. I'm a model and I want to look my best for my job.

content.text: Not much just working a 9 to 5 trying to save up money to go back to school. What about you?
Oh I'm just running track and doing some extra reading. I love reading but I don't have anyone to talk about the books I read with.
That's cool. I used to love to read but I just haven't found the time lately.
Well if you find time again I would love to hear your thoughts about some of the books I've been reading.
Yeah for sure. I've always liked sci fi but I've been trying to branch out and read other genres too.
That's cool. I like to read a lot of different genres too. I'm actually reading a sci fi book right now but I just finished reading a historical fiction book.
Oh I love historical fiction. What book did you just finish reading?
It was called The Book Thief and it was about a young girl who lives in Germany during World War II.
Oh that sounds really interesting. I'll have to check it out.
Yeah it was a really good book. I'm glad I read it.
Well I'm going to get back to work. But it was nice talking to you.
You too. Have a good day at work.
